# Definition

```{r define_parameters}


parameters <-
  lst(
    flag_f = 2,
    flag_qc = 1,
    depth_min = 150,
    bottomdepth_min = 500,
    lat_max = 65,
    year_JGOFS_start = 1981,
    year_JGOFS_end = 1999,
    year_GOSHIP_end = 2012,
    lon_Atl_section = 335.5,
    lon_Pac_section = 190.5,
    lon_Ind_section = 70.5,
    lat_Atl_profile = 40.5,
    inventory_depth = 3000,
    coarse_grid_resolution = 10,
    cruises_meridional = 1041,
    predictors_max = 5,
    predictors_min = 2,
    MLR_number = 10,
    
    depth_levels = c(0, 100, 500, 2000)
    
  )


slabs_Atl <-
  c(
    -Inf,
    26.00,
    26.50,
    26.75,
    27.00,
    27.25,
    27.50,
    27.75,
    27.85,
    27.95,
    28.05,
    28.10,
    28.15,
    28.20,
    Inf
  )

slabs_Ind_Pac <-
  c(-Inf,
    26.00,
    26.50,
    26.75,
    27.00,
    27.25,
    27.50,
    27.75,
    27.85,
    27.95,
    28.05,
    28.10,
    Inf)

```
